EmailTemplate.description: Notification after 2 days in Step 7: Account Approval (Sales Service Rep)
EmailTemplate.name: AIA Step 7: Account Approval (Sales Service Rep)
EmailTemplate.subject: Reassign Approver as Group Structure Document Approval has neither been Approved/Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly: 1. "Account {!AIA_Document__c.Account__c} has not yet approved/rejected the Group Structure document. Please reassign the approver to Sales Management." 2. Link to Group Structure Document : {!AIA_Document__c.Link}
